Enum ANSIColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ANSIColor>
      • snippets.ANSIColor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ANSIColor>
    public enum ANSIColor
extends java.lang.Enum<ANSIColor>
    This enum defined the ASNI color snippets for output.
